duties_responsibilities.duty: Set the strategic direction and lead the planning of undergraduate classes and alumni class-based engagement strategies.
Initiate and lead long-term planning to develop a cohesive alumni and student engagement strategy.
Expand online programming for class connections and enhance the Tech Reunions program.
Manage staff serving all class-based events and focus on developing and implementing strategies around volunteer recruitment, training, and leadership development.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree (Master's preferred) in Alumni Relations, Volunteer Leadership Development, or a related field.
